imdb.plot outline: It might as well have been "Just say yes". Two decades after the infamous campaign, we are undisputedly the biggest consumers of illegal drugs in Europe, and alcohol related deaths have more than doubled. 'Wasted' frankly explores the landscape of drug and alcohol use in the UK, from our record-breaking coke habit to our £20 billion annual drinking problem. Taking a look beyond the shocking headlines, Wasted tackles the issues by meeting those who know the score, from the producers to the addicts.
imdb.title: Wasted
plot: Taking a look beyond the shocking headlines, _Wasted_ (qv) tackles the issues by meeting those who know the score, from the producers to the addicts.::Anonymous
